query.statement:
SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, (SELECT ORG_LEVEL_NM3 FROM SCC_CC WHERE ORG_LEVEL_CD3 = SUBSTR(TM_CD,1,3) AND ROWNUM = 1) BU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, NEW_GUBUN, DAY_AMT AS DAY_AMT, DAY_AMT2 AS DAY_AMT2, DAY_AMT3 AS DAY_AMT3, DAY_AMT4 AS DAY_AMT4, DAY_TOT_AMT AS DAY_TOT_AMT, DAY_TOT_AMT2 AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, DAY_TOT_AMT3 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, DAY_TOT_AMT4 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, PLAN_MON_AMT AS PLAN_MON_AMT, PLAN_MON_AMT2 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, PLAN_MON_AMT3 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, ROUND((CASE WHEN PLAN_MON_AMT = 0 THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE CASE WHEN NEW_GUBUN = '신규' THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE PLAN_MON_AMT * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT*100),1)/100) END END)) PLAN_MON_AMT4 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, (SELECT CASE WHEN OPEN_DATE IS NULL THEN '미지정' WHEN SUBSTR(OPEN_DATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) THEN '신규' ELSE '기존' END FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = T1.UPJANG) NEW_GUBUN, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT2)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT3)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( /* 당일계획/당일누계계획/당월계획 */ SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P1 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P2 END DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 0 DAY_AMT2, --당일_전년실적 0 DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 DAY_AMT4, --당일_당일실적 CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P11 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P21 END DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 0 DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_당일실적 PLAN_MON_AMT PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년실적 0 PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월실적 0 EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, MAX(PRIORITY1_YN) PRIORITY1_YN, MAX(PRIORITY2_YN) PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P1) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P11) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P2) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, --당일(2순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P21) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, --당일누계(2순위) SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT) PLAN_MON_AMT --당월 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, 'Y' PRIORITY1_YN, '' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(DECODE(YMD,#END_DATE#,DD_AMT,0)) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일 SUM(DD_AMT) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, SUM(0) PLAN_MON_AMT FROM DAY_PLAN_V_2PRIORITY WHERE YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANG UNION ALL SELECT T2.MU_CD, T2.MU_NM, T2.TM_CD, T2.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T2.UPJANG), T2.UPJANGNM, '', '', 0, 0, 0, 0, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '06' THEN MM_AMT_06 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '07' THEN MM_AMT_07 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '08' THEN MM_AMT_08 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '09' THEN MM_AMT_09 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '10' THEN MM_AMT_10 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '11' THEN MM_AMT_11 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '12' THEN MM_AMT_12 ELSE 0 END ) AS MM_AMT FROM MAP_BPC_CONFIRM_PL_INFO T1 ,SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T2 WHERE T1.PLAN_CLASS = 'AP' AND T1.PLAN_YEAR = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) AND T1.VER_CD = (SELECT MAX(VER_CD) FROM MAP_BPC_CONFIRM_PL_INFO WHERE PLAN_CLASS = 'AP' AND PLAN_YEAR = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4)) AND T1.CC_CD = T2.CC_CD(+) AND T2.MU_CD(+) = #MU_CD# AND T2.TM_CD(+) LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T2.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T2.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM MAS_ST_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCTCD = T1.ACCT_CD AND ACCTNM2 = '매출액') GROUP BY T2.MU_CD, T2.MU_NM, T2.TM_CD, T2.TM_NM, T2.UPJANG, T2.UPJANGNM ) GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANG ) UNION ALL /* 당일전년실적/당일누계전년실적 */ SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T3.UPJANG), T3.UPJANGNM, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_LY# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END), 0) NET_AMT, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END), 0) TOT_AMT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_MST A , SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL B , SLA_IF_UPJANG_PAYMENT C , SLA_IF_CARD_APPRV_INFO D , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T3 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND B.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND C.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE = B.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = B.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = B.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = B.RECEIPT_NUM AND A.OCCUR_DATE = C.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = C.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = C.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = C.RECEIPT_NUM AND B.SEQ = C.SEQ --선수금 수 AND C.OCCUR_DATE = D.OCCUR_DATE(+) AND C.SYS_CLASS = D.SYS_CLASS(+) AND C.UPJANG_CD = D.UPJANG_CD(+) AND C.RECEIPT_NUM = D.RECEIPT_NUM(+) AND C.SEQ = D.SEQ(+) AND A.UPJANG_CD = T3.UPJANG AND A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# AND T3.UPJANG NOT IN (SELECT Z.CODE FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE Z WHERE Z.GROUP_CODE = 'MA0048' AND Z.USE_YN = 'Y') AND T3.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD,T3.MU_NM,T3.TM_CD,T3.TM_NM,T3.UPJANG,T3.UPJANGNM UNION ALL /* 당일전월실적/당일누계전월실적 */ SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T3.UPJANG), T3.UPJANGNM, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_PM# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END), 0) NET_AMT, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END), 0) TOT_AMT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_MST A , SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL B , SLA_IF_UPJANG_PAYMENT C , SLA_IF_CARD_APPRV_INFO D , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T3 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND B.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND C.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE = B.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = B.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = B.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = B.RECEIPT_NUM AND A.OCCUR_DATE = C.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = C.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = C.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = C.RECEIPT_NUM AND B.SEQ = C.SEQ --선수금 수 AND C.OCCUR_DATE = D.OCCUR_DATE(+) AND C.SYS_CLASS = D.SYS_CLASS(+) AND C.UPJANG_CD = D.UPJANG_CD(+) AND C.RECEIPT_NUM = D.RECEIPT_NUM(+) AND C.SEQ = D.SEQ(+) AND A.UPJANG_CD = T3.UPJANG AND B.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# AND T3.UPJANG NOT IN (SELECT Z.CODE FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE Z WHERE Z.GROUP_CODE = 'MA0048' AND Z.USE_YN = 'Y') AND T3.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD,T3.MU_NM,T3.TM_CD,T3.TM_NM,T3.UPJANG,T3.UPJANGNM UNION ALL /* 당일실적/당일누계실적 */ SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T3.UPJANG), T3.UPJANGNM, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END), 0) NET_AMT, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END), 0) TOT_AMT, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_MST A , SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL B , SLA_IF_UPJANG_PAYMENT C , SLA_IF_CARD_APPRV_INFO D , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T3 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND B.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND C.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE = B.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = B.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = B.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = B.RECEIPT_NUM AND A.OCCUR_DATE = C.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = C.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = C.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = C.RECEIPT_NUM AND B.SEQ = C.SEQ --선수금 수 AND C.OCCUR_DATE = D.OCCUR_DATE(+) AND C.SYS_CLASS = D.SYS_CLASS(+) AND C.UPJANG_CD = D.UPJANG_CD(+) AND C.RECEIPT_NUM = D.RECEIPT_NUM(+) AND C.SEQ = D.SEQ(+) AND A.UPJANG_CD = T3.UPJANG AND A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND T3.UPJANG NOT IN (SELECT Z.CODE FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE Z WHERE Z.GROUP_CODE = 'MA0048' AND Z.USE_YN = 'Y') AND T3.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD,T3.MU_NM,T3.TM_CD,T3.TM_NM,T3.UPJANG,T3.UPJANGNM UNION ALL /* 당월전년실적/당월전월실적 */ SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SUM(LB_MM_AMT), SUM(B_MM_AMT), 0 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, YY, ( CASE WHEN YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,4) THEN CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '06' THEN MM_AMT_06 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '07' THEN MM_AMT_07 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '08' THEN MM_AMT_08 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '09' THEN MM_AMT_09 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '10' THEN MM_AMT_10 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '11' THEN MM_AMT_11 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '12' THEN MM_AMT_12 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END ) AS B_MM_AMT, --전월 ( CASE WHEN YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,4) THEN CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '06' THEN MM_AMT_06 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '07' THEN MM_AMT_07 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '08' THEN MM_AMT_08 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '09' THEN MM_AMT_09 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '10' THEN MM_AMT_10 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '11' THEN MM_AMT_11 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '12' THEN MM_AMT_12 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END ) AS LB_MM_AMT --전년동월 FROM MON_PLAN_UPJANG_PL_V WHERE MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND (YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,4) OR YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,4)) ) GROUP BY MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM ) T1 GROUP BY MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM)
SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, (SELECT ORG_LEVEL_NM3 FROM SCC_CC WHERE ORG_LEVEL_CD3 = SUBSTR(TM_CD,1,3) AND ROWNUM = 1) BU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, NEW_GUBUN, DAY_AMT AS DAY_AMT, DAY_AMT2 AS DAY_AMT2, DAY_AMT3 AS DAY_AMT3, DAY_AMT4 AS DAY_AMT4, DAY_TOT_AMT AS DAY_TOT_AMT, DAY_TOT_AMT2 AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, DAY_TOT_AMT3 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, DAY_TOT_AMT4 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, PLAN_MON_AMT AS PLAN_MON_AMT, PLAN_MON_AMT2 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, PLAN_MON_AMT3 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, ROUND((CASE WHEN PLAN_MON_AMT = 0 THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE CASE WHEN NEW_GUBUN = '신규' THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE PLAN_MON_AMT * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT*100),1)/100) END END)) PLAN_MON_AMT4 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, (SELECT CASE WHEN OPEN_DATE IS NULL THEN '미지정' WHEN SUBSTR(OPEN_DATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) THEN '신규' ELSE '기존' END FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = T1.UPJANG) NEW_GUBUN, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT2)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT3)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( /* 당일계획/당일누계계획/당월계획 */ SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P1 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P2 END DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 0 DAY_AMT2, --당일_전년실적 0 DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 DAY_AMT4, --당일_당일실적 CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P11 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P21 END DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 0 DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_당일실적 PLAN_MON_AMT PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년실적 0 PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월실적 0 EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, MAX(PRIORITY1_YN) PRIORITY1_YN, MAX(PRIORITY2_YN) PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P1) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P11) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P2) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, --당일(2순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P21) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, --당일누계(2순위) SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT) PLAN_MON_AMT --당월 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, 'Y' PRIORITY1_YN, '' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(DECODE(YMD,#END_DATE#,DD_AMT,0)) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일 SUM(DD_AMT) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, SUM(0) PLAN_MON_AMT FROM DAY_PLAN_V_2PRIORITY WHERE YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANG UNION ALL SELECT T2.MU_CD, T2.MU_NM, T2.TM_CD, T2.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T2.UPJANG), T2.UPJANGNM, '', '', 0, 0, 0, 0, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '06' THEN MM_AMT_06 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '07' THEN MM_AMT_07 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '08' THEN MM_AMT_08 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '09' THEN MM_AMT_09 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '10' THEN MM_AMT_10 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '11' THEN MM_AMT_11 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '12' THEN MM_AMT_12 ELSE 0 END ) AS MM_AMT FROM MAP_BPC_CONFIRM_PL_INFO T1 ,SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T2 WHERE T1.PLAN_CLASS = 'AP' AND T1.PLAN_YEAR = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) AND T1.VER_CD = (SELECT MAX(VER_CD) FROM MAP_BPC_CONFIRM_PL_INFO WHERE PLAN_CLASS = 'AP' AND PLAN_YEAR = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4)) AND T1.CC_CD = T2.CC_CD(+) AND T2.MU_CD(+) = #MU_CD# AND T2.TM_CD(+) LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T2.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T2.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM MAS_ST_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCTCD = T1.ACCT_CD AND ACCTNM2 = '매출액') GROUP BY T2.MU_CD, T2.MU_NM, T2.TM_CD, T2.TM_NM, T2.UPJANG, T2.UPJANGNM ) GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANG ) UNION ALL /* 당일전년실적/당일누계전년실적 */ SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T3.UPJANG), T3.UPJANGNM, 0, PLAN_MON_AMT, PLAN_MON_AMT2 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, PLAN_MON_AMT3 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, ROUND((CASE WHEN PLAN_MON_AMT = 0 THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE CASE WHEN NEW_GUBUN = '신규' THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE ('1204','1205','2101','2102') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1201','1202','1203','2104','1209') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1206','1207','1208','2103','1901') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) TOT_AMT, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_MST T1, SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL T2, SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T3 WHERE T1.OCCUR_DATE = T2.OCCUR_DATE AND T1.SYS_CLASS = T2.SYS_CLASS AND T1.UPJANG_CD = T2.UPJANG_CD AND T1.UPJANG_CD = T3.UPJANG AND T1.RECEIPT_NUM =T2.RECEIPT_NUM AND T2.SYS_CLASS IN (12,19,20,21) AND T2.DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND T3.UPJANG NOT IN (SELECT Z.CODE FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE Z WHERE Z.GROUP_CODE = 'MA0048' AND Z.USE_YN = 'Y') AND T3.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD,T3.MU_NM,T3.TM_CD,T3.TM_NM,T3.UPJANG,T3.UPJANGNM UNION ALL /* 당월전년실적/당월전월실적 */ SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SUM(LB_MM_AMT), SUM(B_MM_AMT), 0 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, YY, ( CASE WHEN YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,4) THEN CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '06' THEN MM_AMT_06 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '07' THEN MM_AMT_07 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '08' THEN MM_AMT_08 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '09' THEN MM_AMT_09 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '10' THEN MM_AMT_10 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '11' THEN MM_AMT_11 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '12' THEN MM_AMT_12 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END ) AS B_MM_AMT, --전월 ( CASE WHEN YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,4) THEN CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '06' THEN MM_AMT_06 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '07' THEN MM_AMT_07 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '08' THEN MM_AMT_08 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '09' THEN MM_AMT_09 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '10' THEN MM_AMT_10 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '11' THEN MM_AMT_11 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '12' THEN MM_AMT_12 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END ) AS LB_MM_AMT --전년동월 FROM MON_PLAN_UPJANG_PL_V WHERE MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND (YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,4) OR YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,4)) ) GROUP BY MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM ) T1 GROUP BY MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM)
SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, (SELECT ORG_LEVEL_NM3 FROM SCC_CC WHERE ORG_LEVEL_CD3 = SUBSTR(TM_CD,1,3) AND ROWNUM = 1) BU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, NEW_GUBUN, DAY_AMT AS DAY_AMT, DAY_AMT2 AS DAY_AMT2, DAY_AMT3 AS DAY_AMT3, DAY_AMT4 AS DAY_AMT4, DAY_TOT_AMT AS DAY_TOT_AMT, DAY_TOT_AMT2 AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, DAY_TOT_AMT3 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, DAY_TOT_AMT4 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, PLAN_MON_AMT AS PLAN_MON_AMT, PLAN_MON_AMT2 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, PLAN_MON_AMT3 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, ROUND((CASE WHEN PLAN_MON_AMT = 0 THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE CASE WHEN NEW_GUBUN = '신규' THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE PLAN_MON_AMT * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT*100),1)/100) END END)) PLAN_MON_AMT4 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, (SELECT CASE WHEN OPEN_DATE IS NULL THEN '미지정' WHEN SUBSTR(OPEN_DATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) THEN '신규' ELSE '기존' END FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = T1.UPJANG) NEW_GUBUN, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT2)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT3)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P1 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P2 END DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 0 DAY_AMT2, --당일_전년실적 0 DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 DAY_AMT4, --당일_당일실적 CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P11 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P21 END DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 0 DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_당일실적 CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_MON_AMT1 ELSE PLAN_MON_AMT11 END AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년실적 0 PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월실적 0 EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, UPJANGNM AS UPJANGNM, MAX(PRIORITY1_YN) PRIORITY1_YN, MAX(PRIORITY2_YN) PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P1) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P11) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P2) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, --당일(2순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P21) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, --당일누계(2순위) SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT1) PLAN_MON_AMT1, --당월(1순위) SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT11) PLAN_MON_AMT11 --당월(2순위) FROM ( /* 매출계획 등록 관리(식재사업부) */ SELECT T1.MU_CD, MAX(T1.MU_NM) AS MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, MAX(T1.TM_NM) AS TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, 'Y' PRIORITY1_YN, '' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(DECODE(A.YYYYMMDD,#END_DATE#,A.SALE_AMOUNT,0)) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일 SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN A.SALE_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, SUM(A.SALE_AMOUNT) PLAN_MON_AMT1, SUM(0) PLAN_MON_AMT11 FROM FMB_SALE_PLAN A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.MAIN_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.MAIN_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.MAIN_UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND A.SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0022' AND A.PART_CODE = C.CODE WHERE A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,6)||'31' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND SET1 = D.CC_CD) /* 유통영업팀제외 */ GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.TM_CD, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' UNION ALL /* 유통영업팀 */ SELECT T1.MU_CD, MAX(T1.MU_NM) AS MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, MAX(T1.TM_NM) AS TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, C.CODE_NAME AS UPJANGNM, 'Y' PRIORITY1_YN, '' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(DECODE(A.YYYYMMDD,#END_DATE#,A.SALE_AMOUNT,0)) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일 SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN A.SALE_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, SUM(A.SALE_AMOUNT) PLAN_MON_AMT1, SUM(0) PLAN_MON_AMT11 FROM FMB_SALE_PLAN A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.MAIN_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.MAIN_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.MAIN_UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND A.SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND D.CC_CD = C.SET1 WHERE A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,6)||'31' AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND SET1 = D.CC_CD) /* 유통영업팀 */ GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.TM_CD, C.CODE_NAME /* 유통영업팀 */ UNION ALL /* 마케터별 일계획 관리(식재사업부) */ SELECT T1.MU_CD, MAX(T1.MU_NM) AS MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, MAX(T1.TM_NM) AS TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, '' PRIORITY1_YN, 'Y' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(0), SUM(0), SUM(DECODE(A.YMD,#END_DATE#,A.DD_AMT,0)), --당일 SUM(CASE WHEN A.YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN A.DD_AMT ELSE 0 END) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0), SUM(A.DD_AMT) FROM MAP_DAY_PLAN2 A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND A.SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0022' AND Z.PART_CODE = C.CODE WHERE A.YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,6)||'31' GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.TM_CD, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' ) GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANGNM ) UNION ALL /* 거래처별매출실적(식재사업부) */ SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, --TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG) AS UPJANG, --T1.UPJANGNM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, 0 AS DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 SUM(CASE WHEN A.TRANS_DATE = #END_DATE_LY# THEN DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY) ELSE 0 END) AS DAY_AMT2, --당일_전년실적 0 AS DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 AS DAY_AMT4, --당일_실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 SUM(CASE WHEN A.TRANS_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY) ELSE 0 END) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM FMS_TRANSACTION_V A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.TRANS_UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND Z.PART_SALES_SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0022' AND Z.PART_CODE = C.CODE --추가 WHERE SUBSTR(A.SUBINV_CODE, 1, 2) = 'S1' AND (A.TRANS_TYPE IN '_002' OR A.TRANS_TYPE = 'I001' ) AND A.TRANS_DATE2 BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# --GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,T1.UPJANG,T1.UPJANGNM GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, --TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG), --T1.UPJANGNM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, 0, --당일_계획 0, --당일_전년실적 SUM(CASE WHEN A.TRANS_DATE = #END_DATE_PM# THEN DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY) ELSE 0 END), --당일_전월실적 0, --당일_실적 0, --당일누계_계획 0, --당일누계_전년실적 SUM(CASE WHEN A.TRANS_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# THEN DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY) ELSE 0 END), --당일누계_전월실적 0, --당일누계_실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM FMS_TRANSACTION_V A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.TRANS_UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND Z.PART_SALES_SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0022' AND Z.PART_CODE = C.CODE --추가 WHERE SUBSTR(A.SUBINV_CODE, 1, 2) = 'S1' AND (A.TRANS_TYPE IN '_002' OR A.TRANS_TYPE = 'I001' ) AND A.TRANS_DATE2 BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# --GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,T1.UPJANG,T1.UPJANGNM GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, --TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG), --T1.UPJANGNM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, 0, --당일_계획 0, --당일_전년실적 0, --당일_전월실적 SUM(CASE WHEN A.TRANS_DATE = #END_DATE# THEN DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY) ELSE 0 END), --당일_실적 0, --당일누계_계획 0, --당일누계_전년실적 0, --당일누계_전월실적 SUM(CASE WHEN A.TRANS_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY) ELSE 0 END), --당일누계_실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM FMS_TRANSACTION_V A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.TRANS_UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND Z.PART_SALES_SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0022' AND Z.PART_CODE = C.CODE --추가 WHERE SUBSTR(A.SUBINV_CODE, 1, 2) = 'S1' AND (A.TRANS_TYPE IN '_002' OR A.TRANS_TYPE = 'I001' ) AND A.TRANS_DATE2 BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# --GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,T1.UPJANG,T1.UPJANGNM GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, --TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG), --T1.UPJANGNM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, 0, --당일_계획 0, --당일_전년실적 0, --당일_전월실적 0, --당일_실적 0, --당일누계_계획 0, --당일누계_전년실적 0, --당일누계_전월실적 0, --당일누계_실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY)) PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM FMS_TRANSACTION_V A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.TRANS_UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND Z.PART_SALES_SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0022' AND Z.PART_CODE = C.CODE --추가 WHERE SUBSTR(A.SUBINV_CODE, 1, 2) = 'S1' AND (A.TRANS_TYPE IN '_002' OR A.TRANS_TYPE = 'I001' ) AND A.TRANS_DATE2 BETWEEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,6)||'01' AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,6)||'31' --GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,T1.UPJANG,T1.UPJANGNM GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, --TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG), --T1.UPJANGNM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, 0, --당일_계획 0, --당일_전년실적 0, --당일_전월실적 0, --당일_실적 0, --당일누계_계획 0, --당일누계_전년실적 0, --당일누계_전월실적 0, --당일누계_실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0, --당월_전년 SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY)) PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM FMS_TRANSACTION_V A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.TRANS_UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND Z.PART_SALES_SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0022' AND Z.PART_CODE = C.CODE --추가 WHERE SUBSTR(A.SUBINV_CODE, 1, 2) = 'S1' AND (A.TRANS_TYPE IN '_002' OR A.TRANS_TYPE = 'I001' ) AND A.TRANS_DATE2 BETWEEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,6)||'01' AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,6)||'31' --GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,T1.UPJANG,T1.UPJANGNM GROUP BY T1.MU_CD,T1.MU_NM,T1.TM_CD,T1.TM_NM,H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' UNION ALL /* 출고관리 */ SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, T1.REAL_SALE_AMT END ELSE 0 END) AS DAY_AMT2, --당일_전년실적 0 AS DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 AS DAY_AMT4, --당일_실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 SUM(CASE WHEN T1.RELEASE_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN CASE WHEN T2.CODE_NAME LIKE '%순액%' THEN T1.REAL_SALE_AMT - T1.BUY_CST ELSE T1.REAL_SALE_AMT END ELSE 0 END) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT A.ATTACH_DEPT ,A.BUY_CST ,A.REAL_SALE_AMT ,A.RELEASE_DATE ) T1, SCC_COMMON_CODE T2, HLDC_SC_DEPT_V T3 WHERE T1.ATTACH_DEPT = T2.CODE AND T2.GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND T2.SET1 = T3.CC_CD AND T3.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD T2.CODE_NAME LIKE '%순액%' THEN T1.REAL_SALE_AMT - T1.BUY_CST ELSE T1.REAL_SALE_AMT END ELSE 0 END) AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT A.ATTACH_DEPT ,A.BUY_CST ,A.REAL_SALE_AMT ,A.RELEASE_DATE FROM RELEASE_ITEM_MGMT A WHERE A.RELEASE_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# UNION ALL SELECT A.ATTACH_DEPT ,-1 * B.PURCHASE_RETURN_CST AS BUY_CST ,-1 * B.PURCHASE_RETURN_AMT AS REAL_SALE_AMT ,TO_CHAR(B.PURCHASE_RETURN_DATE) FROM RELEASE_ITEM_MGMT A, PURCHASE_RETURN_MGMT B WHERE A.RELEASE_NUM = B.RELEASE_NUM AND B.PURCHASE_RETURN_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# ) T1, SCC_COMMON_CODE T2, HLDC_SC_DEPT_V T3 WHERE T1.ATTACH_DEPT = T2.CODE AND T2.GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND T2.SET1 = T3.CC_CD AND T3.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, T2.CODE_NAME UNION ALL SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, T2.CODE_NAME AS UPJANGNM, 0 AS DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 0, --당일_전년실적 0, --당일_전월실적 SUM(CASE WHEN T1.RELEASE_DATE = #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN T2.CODE_NAME LIKE '%순액%' THEN T1.REAL_SALE_AMT - T1.BUY_CST ELSE T1.REAL_SALE_AMT END ELSE 0 END) AS DAY_AMT4, --당일_전년실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일_전월실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일_실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_계획 SUM(CASE WHEN T1.RELEASE_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN T2.CODE_NAME LIKE '%순액%' THEN T1.REAL_SALE_AMT - T1.BUY_CST ELSE T1.REAL_SALE_AMT END ELSE 0 END) AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_전년실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT A.ATTACH_DEPT ,A.BUY_CST ,A.REAL_SALE_AMT ,A.RELEASE_DATE FROM RELEASE_ITEM_MGMT A WHERE A.RELEASE_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# UNION ALL SELECT A.ATTACH_DEPT ,-1 * B.PURCHASE_RETURN_CST AS BUY_CST ,-1 * B.PURCHASE_RETURN_AMT AS REAL_SALE_AMT ,TO_CHAR(B.PURCHASE_RETURN_DATE) FROM RELEASE_ITEM_MGMT A, PURCHASE_RETURN_MGMT B WHERE A.RELEASE_NUM = B.RELEASE_NUM AND B.PURCHASE_RETURN_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# ) T1, SCC_COMMON_CODE T2, HLDC_SC_DEPT_V T3 WHERE T1.ATTACH_DEPT = T2.CODE AND T2.GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND T2.SET1 = T3.CC_CD AND T3.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, T2.CODE_NAME UNION ALL SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, T2.CODE_NAME AS UPJANGNM, 0 AS DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 0, --당일_전년실적 0, --당일_전월실적 0, --당일_전년실적 0 AS DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 AS DAY_AMT4, --당일_실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 0, --당일누계_전년실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 SUM(CASE WHEN T2.CODE_NAME LIKE '%순액%' THEN T1.REAL_SALE_AMT - T1.BUY_CST ELSE T1.REAL_SALE_AMT END) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT A.ATTACH_DEPT ,A.BUY_CST ,A.REAL_SALE_AMT ,A.RELEASE_DATE FROM RELEASE_ITEM_MGMT A WHERE A.RELEASE_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,6)||'01' AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,6)||'31' UNION ALL SELECT A.ATTACH_DEPT ,-1 * B.PURCHASE_RETURN_CST AS BUY_CST ,-1 * B.PURCHASE_RETURN_AMT AS REAL_SALE_AMT ,TO_CHAR(B.PURCHASE_RETURN_DATE) FROM RELEASE_ITEM_MGMT A, PURCHASE_RETURN_MGMT B WHERE A.RELEASE_NUM = B.RELEASE_NUM AND B.PURCHASE_RETURN_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,6)||'01' AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,6)||'31' ) T1, SCC_COMMON_CODE T2, HLDC_SC_DEPT_V T3 WHERE T1.ATTACH_DEPT = T2.CODE AND T2.GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND T2.SET1 = T3.CC_CD AND T3.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, T2.CODE_NAME UNION ALL SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, T2.CODE_NAME AS UPJANGNM, 0 AS DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 0, --당일_전년실적 0, --당일_전월실적 0, --당일_전년실적 0 AS DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 AS DAY_AMT4, --당일_실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 0, --당일누계_전년실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0, SUM(CASE WHEN T2.CODE_NAME LIKE '%순액%' THEN T1.REAL_SALE_AMT - T1.BUY_CST ELSE T1.REAL_SALE_AMT END) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT A.ATTACH_DEPT ,A.BUY_CST ,A.REAL_SALE_AMT ,A.RELEASE_DATE FROM RELEASE_ITEM_MGMT A WHERE A.RELEASE_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,6)||'01' AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,6)||'31' UNION ALL SELECT A.ATTACH_DEPT ,-1 * B.PURCHASE_RETURN_CST AS BUY_CST ,-1 * B.PURCHASE_RETURN_AMT AS REAL_SALE_AMT ,TO_CHAR(B.PURCHASE_RETURN_DATE) FROM RELEASE_ITEM_MGMT A, PURCHASE_RETURN_MGMT B WHERE A.RELEASE_NUM = B.RELEASE_NUM AND B.PURCHASE_RETURN_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,6)||'01' AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,6)||'31' ) T1, SCC_COMMON_CODE T2, HLDC_SC_DEPT_V T3 WHERE T1.ATTACH_DEPT = T2.CODE AND T2.GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND T2.SET1 = T3.CC_CD AND T3.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, T2.CODE_NAME /* 출고관리 */ ) T1 GROUP BY MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM)
SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, (SELECT ORG_LEVEL_NM3 FROM SCC_CC WHERE ORG_LEVEL_CD3 = SUBSTR(TM_CD,1,3) AND ROWNUM = 1) BU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, NEW_GUBUN, DAY_AMT AS DAY_AMT, DAY_AMT2 AS DAY_AMT2, DAY_AMT3 AS DAY_AMT3, DAY_AMT4 AS DAY_AMT4, DAY_TOT_AMT AS DAY_TOT_AMT, DAY_TOT_AMT2 AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, DAY_TOT_AMT3 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, DAY_TOT_AMT4 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, PLAN_MON_AMT AS PLAN_MON_AMT, PLAN_MON_AMT2 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, PLAN_MON_AMT3 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, ROUND((CASE WHEN PLAN_MON_AMT = 0 THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE CASE WHEN NEW_GUBUN = '신규' THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE PLAN_MON_AMT * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT*100),1)/100) END END)) PLAN_MON_AMT4 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, (SELECT CASE WHEN OPEN_DATE IS NULL THEN '미지정' WHEN SUBSTR(OPEN_DATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) THEN '신규' ELSE '기존' END FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = T1.UPJANG) NEW_GUBUN, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT2)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT3)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( /* 당일계획/당일누계계획/당월계획 */ SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P1 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P2 END DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 0 DAY_AMT2, --당일_전년실적 0 DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 DAY_AMT4, --당일_당일실적 CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P11 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P21 END DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 0 DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_당일실적 PLAN_MON_AMT PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년실적 0 PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월실적 0 EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, MAX(PRIORITY1_YN) PRIORITY1_YN, MAX(PRIORITY2_YN) PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P1) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P11) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P2) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, --당일(2순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P21) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, --당일누계(2순위) SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT) PLAN_MON_AMT --당월 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, 'Y' PRIORITY1_YN, '' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(DECODE(YMD,#END_DATE#,DD_AMT,0)) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일 SUM(DD_AMT) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, SUM(0) PLAN_MON_AMT FROM DAY_PLAN_V_2PRIORITY WHERE YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANG UNION ALL SELECT T2.MU_CD, T2.MU_NM, T2.TM_CD, T2.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T2.UPJANG), T2.UPJANGNM, '', '', 0, 0, 0, 0, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '06' THEN MM_AMT_06 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '07' THEN MM_AMT_07 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '08' THEN MM_AMT_08 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '09' THEN MM_AMT_09 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '10' THEN MM_AMT_10 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '11' THEN MM_AMT_11 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '12' THEN MM_AMT_12 ELSE 0 END ) AS MM_AMT FROM MAP_BPC_CONFIRM_PL_INFO T1 ,SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T2 WHERE T1.PLAN_CLASS = 'AP' AND T1.PLAN_YEAR = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) AND T1.VER_CD = (SELECT MAX(VER_CD) FROM ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL A , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND A.SYS_CLASS IN ('20','21') AND A.UPJANG_CD = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, YY, ( CASE WHEN YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,4) THEN CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '06' THEN MM_AMT_06 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '07' THEN MM_AMT_07 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '08' THEN MM_AMT_08 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '09' THEN MM_AMT_09 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '10' THEN MM_AMT_10 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '11' THEN MM_AMT_11 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,5,2) = '12' THEN MM_AMT_12 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END ) AS B_MM_AMT, --전월 ( CASE WHEN YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,4) THEN CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '06' THEN MM_AMT_06 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '07' THEN MM_AMT_07 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '08' THEN MM_AMT_08 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '09' THEN MM_AMT_09 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '10' THEN MM_AMT_10 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '11' THEN MM_AMT_11 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,5,2) = '12' THEN MM_AMT_12 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END ) AS LB_MM_AMT --전년동월 FROM MON_PLAN_UPJANG_PL_V WHERE MU_CD = #MU_CD# AND TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND (YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_LY#,1,4) OR YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE_PM#,1,4)) ) GROUP BY MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM ) T1 GROUP BY MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM)
/* 전사업부 조회 속도 체크 필요 */
SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, BU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, NEW_GUBUN, DAY_AMT AS DAY_AMT, DAY_AMT2 AS DAY_AMT2, DAY_AMT3 AS DAY_AMT3, DAY_AMT4 AS DAY_AMT4, DAY_TOT_AMT AS DAY_TOT_AMT, DAY_TOT_AMT2 AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, DAY_TOT_AMT3 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, DAY_TOT_AMT4 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, PLAN_MON_AMT AS PLAN_MON_AMT, PLAN_MON_AMT2 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, PLAN_MON_AMT3 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, ROUND((CASE WHEN PLAN_MON_AMT = 0 THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE CASE WHEN NEW_GUBUN = '신규' THEN PLAN_MON_AMT3 * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT3,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT3*100),1)/100) ELSE PLAN_MON_AMT * (ROUND(DECODE(DAY_TOT_AMT,0,0,DAY_TOT_AMT4/DAY_TOT_AMT*100),1)/100) END END)) PLAN_MON_AMT4 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, BU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, MAX(NEW_GUBUN) AS NEW_GUBUN, SUM(DAY_AMT) AS DAY_AMT, SUM(DAY_AMT2) AS DAY_AMT2, SUM(DAY_AMT3) AS DAY_AMT3, SUM(DAY_AMT4) AS DAY_AMT4, SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT) AS DAY_TOT_AMT, SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT2) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT3) AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT4) AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT) AS PLAN_MON_AMT, SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT2) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT3) AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM (
SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, (SELECT ORG_LEVEL_NM3 FROM SCC_CC WHERE ORG_LEVEL_CD3 = SUBSTR(TM_CD,1,3) AND ROWNUM = 1) BU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, NEW_GUBUN, DAY_AMT AS DAY_AMT, DAY_AMT2 AS DAY_AMT2, DAY_AMT3 AS DAY_AMT3, DAY_AMT4 AS DAY_AMT4, DAY_TOT_AMT AS DAY_TOT_AMT, DAY_TOT_AMT2 AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, DAY_TOT_AMT3 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, DAY_TOT_AMT4 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, PLAN_MON_AMT AS PLAN_MON_AMT, PLAN_MON_AMT2 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, PLAN_MON_AMT3 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, (SELECT CASE WHEN OPEN_DATE IS NULL THEN '미지정' WHEN SUBSTR(OPEN_DATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) THEN '신규' ELSE '기존' END FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = T1.UPJANG) NEW_GUBUN, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT2)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT3)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( /* 당일계획/당일누계계획/당월계획 */ SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P1 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P2 END DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 0 DAY_AMT2, --당일_전년실적 0 DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 DAY_AMT4, --당일_당일실적 CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P11 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P21 END DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 0 DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_당일실적 PLAN_MON_AMT PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년실적 0 PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월실적 0 EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, MAX(PRIORITY1_YN) PRIORITY1_YN, MAX(PRIORITY2_YN) PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P1) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P11) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P2) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, --당일(2순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P21) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, --당일누계(2순위) SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT) PLAN_MON_AMT --당월 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, 'Y' PRIORITY1_YN, '' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(DECODE(YMD,#END_DATE#,DD_AMT,0)) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일 SUM(DD_AMT) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, SUM(0) PLAN_MON_AMT FROM DAY_PLAN_V_2PRIORITY WHERE YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND MU_CD IN ('2001','2002','2005') GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANG UNION ALL SELECT T2.MU_CD, T2.MU_NM, T2.TM_CD, T2.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T2.UPJANG), T2.UPJANGNM, '', '', 0, 0, 0, 0, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '01' THEN MM_AMT_01 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '02' THEN MM_AMT_02 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '03' THEN MM_AMT_03 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '04' THEN MM_AMT_04 WHEN SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,5,2) = '05' THEN MM_AMT_05 SUBSTR(OPEN_DATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) THEN '신규' ELSE '기존' END FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = T1.UPJANG) NEW_GUBUN, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT2)/1000) AS ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT3)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( /* 당일계획/당일누계계획/당월계획 */ SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P1 WHEN PRIORITY2_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P21 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P31 END DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 0 DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_당일실적 PLAN_MON_AMT PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년실적 0 PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월실적 0 EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, MAX(PRIORITY1_YN) PRIORITY1_YN, MAX(PRIORITY2_YN) PRIORITY2_YN, MAX(PRIORITY3_YN) PRIORITY3_YN, SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P1) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P11) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P2) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, --당일(2순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P21) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, --당일누계(2순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P3) PLAN_DD_AMT_P3, --당일(3순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P31) PLAN_DD_AMT_P31, --당일누계(3순위) SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT) PLAN_MON_AMT --당월 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, UPJANG, MAX(UPJANGNM) AS UPJANGNM, 'Y' PRIORITY1_YN, '' PRIORITY2_YN, '' PRIORITY3_YN, SUM(DECODE(YMD,#END_DATE#,DD_AMT,0)) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일 SUM(DD_AMT) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P3, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P31, SUM(0) PLAN_MON_AMT FROM DAY_PLAN_V_1PRIORITY WHERE YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND MU_CD = '2003' AND TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANG UNION ALL SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, MM_AMT FROM DAY_PLAN_V_3PRIORITY WHERE YY = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) AND START_DD = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,6)||'01' AND MU_CD = '2003' AND TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' ) GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANG ) UNION ALL /* 당일전년실적/당일누계전년실적 */ SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T3.UPJANG), T3.UPJANGNM, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_LY# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1204','1205','2101','2102') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_LY# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1201','1202','1203','2104','1209') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_LY# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1206','1207','1208','2103','1901') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) NET_AMT, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1204','1205','2101','2102') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1201','1202','1203','2104','1209') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN T1.OCCUR_DATE = T2.OCCUR_DATE AND T1.SYS_CLASS = T2.SYS_CLASS AND T1.UPJANG_CD = T2.UPJANG_CD AND T1.UPJANG_CD = T3.UPJANG AND T1.RECEIPT_NUM =T2.RECEIPT_NUM AND T2.SYS_CLASS IN (12,19,20,21) AND T3.MU_CD = '2003' AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD,T3.MU_NM,T3.TM_CD,T3.TM_NM,T3.UPJANG,T3.UPJANGNM UNION ALL /* 당일전월실적/당일누계전월실적 */ SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T3.UPJANG), T3.UPJANGNM, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_PM# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1204','1205','2101','2102') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_PM# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1201','1202','1203','2104','1209') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_PM# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1206','1207','1208','2103','1901') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) NET_AMT, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1204','1205','2101','2102') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1201','1202','1203','2104','1209') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1206','1207','1208','2103','1901') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) TOT_AMT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_MST T1, SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL T2, SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T3 WHERE T1.OCCUR_DATE = T2.OCCUR_DATE AND T1.SYS_CLASS = T2.SYS_CLASS AND T1.UPJANG_CD = T2.UPJANG_CD AND T1.UPJANG_CD = T3.UPJANG AND T1.RECEIPT_NUM =T2.RECEIPT_NUM AND T2.SYS_CLASS IN (12,19,20,21) AND T2.DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# AND T3.UPJANG NOT IN (SELECT Z.CODE FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE Z WHERE Z.GROUP_CODE = 'MA0048' AND Z.USE_YN = 'Y') AND T3.MU_CD = '2003' AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD,T3.MU_NM,T3.TM_CD,T3.TM_NM,T3.UPJANG,T3.UPJANGNM UNION ALL /* 당일실적/당일누계실적 */ SELECT T3.MU_CD, T3.MU_NM, T3.TM_CD, T3.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T3.UPJANG), T3.UPJANGNM, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1204','1205','2101','2102') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1201','1202','1203','2104','1209') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1206','1207','1208','2103','1901') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) NET_AMT, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1204','1205','2101','2102') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1201','1202','1203','2104','1209') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) + NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN CASE WHEN SALS_CLASS IN ('1206','1207','1208','2103','1901') THEN T2.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END), 0) TOT_AMT, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_MST T1, SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL T2, SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T3 WHERE T1.OCCUR_DATE = T2.OCCUR_DATE AND T1.SYS_CLASS = T2.SYS_CLASS AND T1.UPJANG_CD = T2.UPJANG_CD AND T1.UPJANG_CD = T3.UPJANG AND T1.RECEIPT_NUM =T2.RECEIPT_NUM AND T2.SYS_CLASS IN (12,19,20,21) AND T2.DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND T2.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND T3.UPJANG NOT IN (SELECT Z.CODE FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE Z WHERE Z.GROUP_CODE = 'MA0048' AND Z.USE_YN = 'Y') AND T3.MU_CD = '2003' AND T3.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T3.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T3.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T3.MU_CD,T3.MU_NM,T3.TM_CD,T3.TM_NM,T3.UPJANG,T3.UPJANGNM ) T1 GROUP BY MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM) UNION ALL
SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, (SELECT ORG_LEVEL_NM3 FROM SCC_CC WHERE ORG_LEVEL_CD3 = SUBSTR(TM_CD,1,3) AND ROWNUM = 1) BU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, NEW_GUBUN, DAY_AMT AS DAY_AMT, DAY_AMT2 AS DAY_AMT2, DAY_AMT3 AS DAY_AMT3, DAY_AMT4 AS DAY_AMT4, DAY_TOT_AMT AS DAY_TOT_AMT, DAY_TOT_AMT2 AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, DAY_TOT_AMT3 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, DAY_TOT_AMT4 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, PLAN_MON_AMT AS PLAN_MON_AMT, PLAN_MON_AMT2 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, PLAN_MON_AMT3 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, (SELECT CASE WHEN OPEN_DATE IS NULL THEN '미지정' WHEN SUBSTR(OPEN_DATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) THEN '신규' ELSE '기존' END FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = T1.UPJANG) NEW_GUBUN, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT2)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT3)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P1 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P2 END DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 0 DAY_AMT2, --당일_전년실적 0 DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 DAY_AMT4, --당일_당일실적 CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_DD_AMT_P11 ELSE PLAN_DD_AMT_P21 END DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 0 DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_당일실적 CASE WHEN PRIORITY1_YN = 'Y' THEN PLAN_MON_AMT1 ELSE PLAN_MON_AMT11 END AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년실적 0 PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월실적 0 EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MAX(MU_NM) AS MU_NM, TM_CD, MAX(TM_NM) AS TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, UPJANGNM AS UPJANGNM, MAX(PRIORITY1_YN) PRIORITY1_YN, MAX(PRIORITY2_YN) PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P1) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P11) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계(1순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P2) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, --당일(2순위) SUM(PLAN_DD_AMT_P21) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, --당일누계(2순위) SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT1) PLAN_MON_AMT1, --당월(1순위) SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT11) PLAN_MON_AMT11 --당월(2순위) FROM ( /* 매출계획 등록 관리(식재사업부) */ SELECT T1.MU_CD, MAX(T1.MU_NM) AS MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, MAX(T1.TM_NM) AS TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, 'Y' PRIORITY1_YN, '' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(DECODE(A.YYYYMMDD,#END_DATE#,A.SALE_AMOUNT,0)) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일 SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN A.SALE_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, SUM(A.SALE_AMOUNT) PLAN_MON_AMT1, SUM(0) PLAN_MON_AMT11 FROM FMB_SALE_PLAN A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.MAIN_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.MAIN_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = '2004' AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.MAIN_UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND A.SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0022' AND A.PART_CODE = C.CODE WHERE A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,6)||'31' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND SET1 = D.CC_CD) /* 유통영업팀제외 */ GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.TM_CD, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' UNION ALL /* 유통영업팀 */ SELECT T1.MU_CD, MAX(T1.MU_NM) AS MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, MAX(T1.TM_NM) AS TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, C.CODE_NAME AS UPJANGNM, 'Y' PRIORITY1_YN, '' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(DECODE(A.YYYYMMDD,#END_DATE#,A.SALE_AMOUNT,0)) PLAN_DD_AMT_P1, --당일 SUM(CASE WHEN A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN A.SALE_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P2, SUM(0) PLAN_DD_AMT_P21, SUM(A.SALE_AMOUNT) PLAN_MON_AMT1, SUM(0) PLAN_MON_AMT11 FROM FMB_SALE_PLAN A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.MAIN_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.MAIN_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = '2004' AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.MAIN_UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND A.SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND D.CC_CD = C.SET1 WHERE A.YYYYMMDD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,6)||'31' AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'ATTACH_DEPT' AND SET1 = D.CC_CD) /* 유통영업팀 */ GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.TM_CD, C.CODE_NAME /* 유통영업팀 */ UNION ALL /* 마케터별 일계획 관리(식재사업부) */ SELECT T1.MU_CD, MAX(T1.MU_NM) AS MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, MAX(T1.TM_NM) AS TM_NM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, '' PRIORITY1_YN, 'Y' PRIORITY2_YN, SUM(0), SUM(0), SUM(DECODE(A.YMD,#END_DATE#,A.DD_AMT,0)), --당일 SUM(CASE WHEN A.YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN A.DD_AMT ELSE 0 END) PLAN_DD_AMT_P11, --당일누계 SUM(0), SUM(A.DD_AMT) FROM MAP_DAY_PLAN2 A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = '2004' AND T1.TM_CD LIKE #TM_CD#||'%' AND T1.UPJANG LIKE #UPJANG#||'%' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') INNER JOIN FMS_UPJANG Z ON 1 = 1 AND A.UPJANG = Z.UPJANG LEFT JOIN HR_PERSONAL H ON 1 = 1 AND A.SABUN = H.SABUN INNER JOIN HLDC_SC_DEPT_V D ON 1 = 1 AND B2.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SCC_COMMON_CODE C ON C.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0022' AND Z.PART_CODE = C.CODE WHERE A.YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,6)||'31' GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.TM_CD, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' ) GROUP BY MU_CD, TM_CD, UPJANGNM )
UNION ALL /* 거래처별매출실적(식재사업부) */ SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, --TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG) AS UPJANG, --T1.UPJANGNM, '' AS UPJANG, H.NM_KOR||'('||H.SABUN||')' AS UPJANGNM, 0 AS DAY_AMT, --당일_계획 SUM(CASE WHEN A.TRANS_DATE = #END_DATE_LY# THEN DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY) ELSE 0 END) AS DAY_AMT2, --당일_전년실적 0 AS DAY_AMT3, --당일_전월실적 0 AS DAY_AMT4, --당일_실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT, --당일누계_계획 SUM(CASE WHEN A.TRANS_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN DECODE(SUBSTR(A.TRANS_TYPE,1,1),'I',1,-1) * ROUND(NVL(A.SALE_PRICE, 0) * A.TRANS_QTY) ELSE 0 END) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, --당일누계_전년실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, --당일누계_전월실적 0 AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, --당일누계_실적 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT, --당월_계획 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, --당월_전년 0 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3, --당월_전월 0 AS EST_AMT --당월_추정 FROM FMS_TRANSACTION_V A INNER JOIN ST_UPJANG B2 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = B2.UPJANG INNER JOIN SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 ON A.TRANS_UPJANG = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD PLAN_MON_AMT, PLAN_MON_AMT2 AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, PLAN_MON_AMT3 AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( SELECT MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, (SELECT CASE WHEN OPEN_DATE IS NULL THEN '미지정' WHEN SUBSTR(OPEN_DATE,1,4) = SUBSTR(#END_DATE#,1,4) THEN '신규' ELSE '기존' END FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = T1.UPJANG) NEW_GUBUN, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT2)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT3)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT3, ROUND(SUM(DAY_TOT_AMT4)/1000) AS DAY_TOT_AMT4, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT2)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT2, ROUND(SUM(PLAN_MON_AMT3)/1000) AS PLAN_MON_AMT3 FROM ( /* 당일전년실적/당일누계전년실적 */ /* 매출등록조회 */ SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG) AS UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM, 0 DAY_AMT, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_LY# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) DAY_AMT2, 0 DAY_AMT3, 0 DAY_AMT4, 0 DAY_TOT_AMT, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) DAY_TOT_AMT2, 0 DAY_TOT_AMT3, 0 DAY_TOT_AMT4, 0 PLAN_MON_AMT, 0 PLAN_MON_AMT2, 0 PLAN_MON_AMT3, 0 EST_AMT FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_MST A , SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL B , SLA_IF_UPJANG_PAYMENT C , SLA_IF_CARD_APPRV_INFO D , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND B.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND C.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE = B.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = B.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = B.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = B.RECEIPT_NUM AND A.OCCUR_DATE = C.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = C.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = C.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = C.RECEIPT_NUM AND B.SEQ = C.SEQ --선수금 수 AND C.OCCUR_DATE = D.OCCUR_DATE(+) AND C.SYS_CLASS = D.SYS_CLASS(+) AND C.UPJANG_CD = D.UPJANG_CD(+) AND C.RECEIPT_NUM = D.RECEIPT_NUM(+) AND C.SEQ = D.SEQ(+) AND A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# AND A.SYS_CLASS IN ('17','19') AND A.UPJANG_CD = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = '2005' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, T1.UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG) AS UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.MG_DATE = #END_DATE_LY# THEN A.DELY_TOT_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.MG_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN A.DELY_TOT_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM EPROCUSR.ESIDLRT A, EPROCUSR.ESPSWHC B, SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 WHERE A.SYS_ID = '100' AND A.COMP_CD = 'HFC' AND A.MG_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# AND A.STS <> 'D' AND A.SYS_ID = B.SYS_ID AND A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD AND A.WH_CNTR_CD = B.WH_CNTR_CD AND B.SHOP_CD = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = '2005' GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, T1.UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG) AS UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_LY# THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL A , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_LY# AND #END_DATE_LY# AND A.SYS_CLASS IN ('20','21') AND A.UPJANG_CD = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = '2005' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, T1.UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG) AS UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_PM# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_MST A , SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL B , SLA_IF_UPJANG_PAYMENT C , SLA_IF_CARD_APPRV_INFO D , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND B.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND C.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE = B.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = B.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = B.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = B.RECEIPT_NUM AND A.OCCUR_DATE = C.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = C.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = C.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = C.RECEIPT_NUM AND B.SEQ = C.SEQ --선수금 수 AND C.OCCUR_DATE = D.OCCUR_DATE(+) AND C.SYS_CLASS = D.SYS_CLASS(+) AND C.UPJANG_CD = D.UPJANG_CD(+) AND C.RECEIPT_NUM = D.RECEIPT_NUM(+) AND C.SEQ = D.SEQ(+) AND A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# AND A.SYS_CLASS IN ('17','19') AND A.UPJANG_CD = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = '2005' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, T1.UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG) AS UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.MG_DATE = #END_DATE_PM# THEN A.DELY_TOT_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.MG_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# THEN A.DELY_TOT_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM EPROCUSR.ESIDLRT A, EPROCUSR.ESPSWHC B, SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 WHERE A.SYS_ID = '100' AND A.COMP_CD = 'HFC' AND A.MG_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# AND A.STS <> 'D' AND A.SYS_ID = B.SYS_ID AND A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD AND A.WH_CNTR_CD = B.WH_CNTR_CD AND B.SHOP_CD = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = '2005' GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, T1.UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG) AS UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE_PM# THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL A , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE_PM# AND #END_DATE_PM# AND A.SYS_CLASS IN ('20','21') AND A.UPJANG_CD = T1.UPJANG AND T1.MU_CD = '2005' AND T1.CC_CD NOT IN ('317770','317780','317840','315920','318760') GROUP BY T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, T1.UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM UNION ALL SELECT T1.MU_CD, T1.MU_NM, T1.TM_CD, T1.TM_NM, TO_CHAR(T1.UPJANG) AS UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN B.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN B.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_MST A , SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL B , SLA_IF_UPJANG_PAYMENT C , SLA_IF_CARD_APPRV_INFO D , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND B.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND C.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE = B.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = B.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = B.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = B.RECEIPT_NUM AND A.OCCUR_DATE = C.OCCUR_DATE AND A.SYS_CLASS = C.SYS_CLASS AND A.UPJANG_CD = C.UPJANG_CD AND A.RECEIPT_NUM = C.RECEIPT_NUM AND B.SEQ = C.SEQ --선수금 수 AND C.OCCUR_DATE = UPJANG, T1.UPJANGNM, 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.OCCUR_DATE = #END_DATE# THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END),0), 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL A , SCO_UPJANG_MST_V T1 WHERE A.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND A.OCCUR_DATE BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND A.SYS_CLASS IN ('20','21') AND MU_CD, MU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM) ) GROUP BY MU_CD, MU_NM, BU_NM, TM_CD, TM_NM, UPJANG, UPJANGNM )
